title: Little Busters! English Edition
notes: The game opens, but freezes after a second. Minimizing and maximizing the game allows it to run for a second before freezing again.

title: Little Busters! English Edition
notes: Launch configuration tool opens, but freezes momentarily. You can unfreeze my minimizing and reopening the window to have it freeze again several moments later.
Crash on startup. Configuration tool launches but freezes after a moment - minimising and restoring un-freezes the configuration tool for a moment.
title: Little Busters! English Edition

notes: The game hangs on the logo screen, but the steam overlay and resizing the window still work. I assume it's a problem with reading the game scripts that make it freeze.
title: Little Busters! English Edition
